\end{itemize}

\item {} 
fields.py

\end{itemize}

\section{2012.07.19}
\label{changelog:id3}
\textbf{Add}
\begin{itemize}
\item {}

\end{itemize}

\textbf{Fix}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
templatetag gallery\_image id size type

\end{itemize}

\label{changelog:id5}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

\end{itemize}

\textbf{Fix}
\begin{itemize}
\item {}

\item {}

\item {} 
Optimized category save method.

\item {} 
Remove category puth method.

\end{itemize}
